comments.text: hi! i'm trying to figure out how i can "save" a thing i've done. when i'm trying there's a message saying somethng like- ooops! something went wrong with this specific item.
iv'e also donated 9 euro. i though maybe thats why... but still.. sob" sob"
can't say i've come across that problem before, sorry.
thank you for your response. i'm a new player, i want to play so bad! haha! in the tutorial it says that you should start on a rock, i cant see a rock.. just floating in space :)
i'm going to ping you.  you should get notified and you'll be able to come to me.  if not, search space craft then go to the room with 1 person in it.
well i teleported and there's a different background.. but i can't see any polygons/creations... im going to try a different steam account:)
different account didn't help either... let's try a different pc:)
hopefully philipp will have a solution. he usually reads these.
now iv'e tried 2 different computers with 1080 ti cards with 2 accounts, no progress... i hope so, i have watched almost every tutorial he made this far, he seems like a nice guy:)
i've developed some games by myself, art, music and programming. i can't wait to get started here and make some awsome machines:d
micke sorry for that, can you please go to me -> ... -> more -> tick"show errors", and try saving again?
you should then be able to see in the middle of the screen in red an error message, if any. thx!
hey buddy! well it's about mesh, i'm goin to email the context to your support mail:)
